description.p: Her ne zaman hedefli bir saldırıya maruz kalırsanız reaksiyondan kalkanınızla gard alırsınız ve o kişiden yapılacak saldırılara karşı sonraki turunuzun başına kadar +2 AC kazanırsınız, reaksiyondan gard almış olduğunuz kişiden gelen hedeflemeli saldırılardan 2d4 daha az bluedoning,slasing and piercing hasar alırsınız.

Bonus aksiyondan rakibe kalkanınızla 1d4 + Strength modifier değeriniz kasar hasar vurabilirsiniz. Başarılı saldırı sonucunda kişiye turunuzun sonuna kadar yapacağınız ilk arbede silahlı saldırı avantajlı olur.

description.p: You’ve learned to put the weight of a weapon to your advantage, letting its momentum empower your strikes. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.
Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with. If the attack hits, you add proficiency bonus + 2 to the attack’s damage.

sheet.description: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action. Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with. If the attack hits, you add {{proficiency:damage}} to the attack’s damage.

description.p: You have mastered ranged weapons and can make shots that others find impossible. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Attacking at long range doesn’t impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.
Your ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.
Before you make an attack with a ranged weapon that you are proficient with. If the attack hits, you add proficiency bonus to the attack’s damage.

sheet.description: Attacking at long range doesn’t impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls. Your ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover. Before you make an attack with a ranged weapon that you are proficient with. If the attack hits, you add {{sharpshooter:damage}} to the attack’s damage.

description.p: When you are wielding an one-handed weapon with which you are proficient and another creature hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC for that attack, potentially causing the attack to miss you. If you have successfully defended the attack made against you, you can make a counterattack as part of the same reaction. If you are holding two one-handed weapons and have the Two-Weapon Fighting style, you can make an attack with both of your weapons.
